input.sentences: was in dire need of a cupcake so i went to sprinkles in location location .
apparently they were having some kind of thing where you buy a cupcake and they give to charity .
that 's a nice thing they are doing . i bought several cupcakes .

output.sentences: The charity cupcake sale was usually a big event.
The cupcakes were legendary and their deliciousness usually meant for strong sales.
People loved the taste so they didn't mind making the charitable donations, too!
Sprinkles Bakery knew how to tempt passersby, too.
Their treats were always big moneymakers and super-tasty, as well.
